mapper.select: select mc.Seq as seq ,mc.ClassName as className ,mc.StudentCnt as studentCount ,mc.TeacherCode as mainTeacherCode ,a.Name as mainTeacherName ,mc.SubTeacherCode as subTeacherCode ,b.Name as subTeacherName ,mc.Grade as gradeCode ,cbc.CodeName as gradeName from MEM_Class mc left outer join Mem_Teacher a on mc.TeacherCode = a.TeacherCode left outer join Mem_Teacher b on mc.SubTeacherCode = b.TeacherCode left outer join COM_BaseCode cbc on mc.Grade = cbc.Code1 and cbc.GubunSeq = 4 where 1=1 and mc.HakwonCode = #{hakwonCode}
select Seq as seq ,ClassName as className from MEM_Class where 1=1 and HakwonCode = #{hakwonCode}
select ms.StudentCode as studentCode ,ms.Name as studentName from MEM_Class_StudentList mcsl inner join MEM_Student ms on mcsl.StudentCode = ms.StudentCode where 1=1 and mcsl.ClassSeq = #{seq}
